3.115. 
Right to compensation 
1. If fines for offences committed by one of the spouses, as well as compensation for damage caused by the actions of one of the spouses, have been paid out of the community property, the guilty spouse is obliged to compensate for the reduction in the community property. 
2. If the transaction was entered into solely for the personal needs of one spouse and was carried out using property which is community property, that spouse must compensate for the loss of community property.
